Title: Dawg Coffee
Description: This was my first attempt at building a modern web page. We were tasked to replicate a site to the best of our abilities via pictures and limited instructions. This is where I learned more about CSS as well as how Bootstrap can be a great asset for scaling a page down to a mobile device.

Title: Mapping Police Shootings
Description: In this challenge, I learned how to use Leaflet.js to create an interactive map. We used data from a crowdsourced police shooting site to overlay circles onto the map which when hovered over will display data on the incident.

Title: CRUD Product Review
Description: A CRUD app allows a user to create, read, update and delete content on this site and this challenge displayed this by letting users rate a fake product by posting a review. This review can be upvoted and deleted as well.

Title: Spotify Challenge
Description: In this challenge, we were asked to use the Spotify API to create a music related app. I elected to make an app that would help users find new music by randomly creating a playlist of songs by artists related to the artist that the user requests.
